text: Ej mardum, dar haqiqat ʙaroi sumo az coniʙi Parvardigoraton huccate omad va ʙaroi sumo nuri oskore nozil kardaem, (ki on nur, Qur'oni ʙuzurgest, ki ulumi guzastagon va ojandagonro dar ʙar dorad. Pas mardum agar dar zeri anvori Qur'on rohasonro najoʙand, dar toriki va ʙadʙaxtii ʙuzurge ƣuta xohand zad)
